var convertData = function(data) {
    var res = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
        var geoCoord = [data[i].lng, data[i].lat];
        res.push({
            name: data[i].formatted_address,
            value: geoCoord.concat([data[i].feature, data[i].type, data[i].area, data[i].gdp])
        });
    }
    return res;
};

var convertData2 = function(data) {
    var res = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
        res.push({
            name: data[i].formatted_address,
            value: data[i].type
        });
    }
    return res;
};

option = {
    title: {
        text: '特色小镇空间分布',
        left: 'center',
        textStyle: {
            fontSize: 28,
            color: '#000'
        }
    },
    tooltip: {
        formatter: function(params) {
            name = params.data.name;
            feature = params.data.value[2];
            type = params.data.value[3];
            area = params.data.value[4];
            gdp = params.data.value[5];
            res = '<strong>' + name + ' </strong> ' + type + '<br />' +
                feature + '<br />' +
                'Area:' + area + '平方公里,' + 'GDP:' + gdp + '亿元';
            return res;
        }
    },
    visualMap: [{
            min: 0,
            max: 500,
            left: "right",
            top: 'center',
            text: ['GDP'],
            dimension: 5,
            inRange: {
                color: ['lightskyblue', 'yellow', 'orangered', ]
            },
            itemHeight: 400,
            calculable: true
        },

        {
            min: 25,
            max: 9500,
            left: 'left',
            top: 'center',
            dimension: 4,
            inRange: {
                symbolSize: [10, 100]
            },
            itemHeight: 400,
            calculable: true
        },
    ],
    geo: {
        map: 'china',
        roam: true,
    },
    series: [{
        name: 'town',
        type: 'scatter',
        coordinateSystem: 'geo',
        data: convertData(alldata),
        itemStyle: {
            normal: {
                color: '#FF6C00',
            }
        }
    },
    // {
